hero.title: Hi, I'm Blake Tarter.
hero.subtitle: A Kansas City based web developer

aboutMe.title: About Me.
aboutMe.summary: Blake is a Javascript developer with 3+ years of experience planning, creating, and maintaining websites and various application platforms. Some technologies that he uses on a regular basis are React, Angular, and Ionic. His projects include client and consumer facing websites, as well as react-native and hybrid applications. He has experience working in a team environment, exceeds in time management skills, and strives to remain on the cutting-edge of the front-end development scene.

workItems.title: KCMO Bus Stops
workItems.desc: A React Native application that shows bus stops in the Kansas City area around your current location and hands off navigation to them using the system navigation app.

workItems.title: Web Audio Synth
workItems.desc: Web-based synthesizer using the Web Audio API that also displays its waveform using Canvas that can be played with a computer keyboard.

workItems.title: Random Text Replacer
workItems.desc: Tool to create similar phrases with interchangable words using a simple syntax to select a random word from a list of possibilities.

workItems.title: PaginatedListView
workItems.desc: Extension of React-Native ListView that takes a fetch function and a page size and automatically handles pagination.

workItems.title: simple-fp
workItems.desc: A simple, small, no dependency functional programming library used as a tool to explore functional programming concepts.

workItems.title: Dungeon Gen
workItems.desc: Playing around with procedurally generating ascii based dungeons with rooms and envirnmental hazards.

workItems.title: Morse Code Generator
workItems.desc: Javascript code that turns plain text into Morse Code style dots and dashes.
